Articles.Content:
http://imgur.com/a/Pq2Ro

The artwork is almost finished, my komrades.

I've purchased my parts and am awaiting shipment. However, I'm a much better artist than I am an electrician/programmer. This may take some extra time.

I will be contacting the community for help. In return, I can offer my skills as an artist.

-FULL THROTTLE!! WOO!!!

http://imgur.com/a/Pq2Ro

Your artwork looks good!

I especially like the little details such as the coffeemug-stain and the defacing komments.

I'm eager to see your finished product!

Your artwork looks good!

I especially like the little details such as the coffeemug-stain and the defacing komments.

I'm eager to see your finished product!

Thanks, T-Bouw! That defacing stuff has happened everywhere I worked (as tongue-in-cheek jokes) so I thought that the Kerbals would have some fun with their co-workers too!

-It will be an evolving project, since I only know how to wire buttons and joysticks (from building MAME arcades) but I've been learning electronics and programming lately and will

soon include LEDs, SoundFX, and digital readouts. I've been drawing since before my earliest moments, so I thought I can come to the community for help regarding my wiring

and programming and can trade my artistic talents

Thanks for your kind words, btw.
